title: Less Brakes launch with discipline-specific sintered, organic and ceramic brake pads
content:
Luis Garc√≠a, developer of Ride Panzer, has launched a new brake pad brand; Less Brakes. Offering a range of sintered, organic and ceramic pads, the brand differentiate themselves from competitors with their “discipline-specific” compounds covering eMTB, Downhill, Enduro, XC, Gravel and Road. Less Brakes Investing in top-quality aftermarket pads is a very effective way of […]

The post Less Brakes launch with discipline-specific sintered, organic and ceramic brake pads appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
